name: Commodore 64 Draw Program
description: This Is a small drawing program I made in my spare time! You control it using a joystick in port 2 and hold the fire button to start drawing your picture.  Initially you will need to choose a foreground and background color and a speed.  To reset the drawing surface you can push "E" and to quit the program you can push "Q".  other than that there is not much else.  I have both a .WAV file if you want to put it on an audio cassette to play in an actual machine, or a .TAP file for playing in an emulator.
